accordionContent.description: We are a team of experts who help start-ups, SMEs, government and public institutions to build maintainable web, mobile and backend applications. Our strengths are our experience and our team. We offer services that consists from building prototypes in no-time to building scalable products that deliver innovation.

content.data: Do you have a disruptive idea? Do you think that speed and agility are key factors to succeed? We think the same. Our team has over 20 years of experience helping DAX companies innovate and launch new products and business lines. We will guide your company through all the steps of the product development cycle from the idea generation, concept development, feasibility study, customer validation and testing, all the way to market launch.

Innovation is disrupting many industries and businesses. Software can help you increase efficiency and quality of your processes and provide KPI metrics that support better decision making. It can help better understand your customers and by leveraging the power of data it gives you **the edge** needed to succeed.

We can help you on your journey towards digitalisation by building software that is secure, reliable and most importantly adds value to your company.

Our cost structure is based on person days. We provide a detailed estimation for the planned phase of the project in terms of time and will recommend the budget based on that.

Projects typically run for 20 - 60 person days.
SMEs and corporations who are looking to innovate and launch new digital products.

items.title: Introduction
items.description: We will set up a call to learn more about your idea. In the next 24 hours, we’ll perform a feasibility research and get back to you with timeline and costs. We will also discuss about the next steps in details.

items.title: Workshop
items.description: We’ll organise a workshop to discuss about further project requirements and define the scope (the backlog) for a Minimum Viable Product. In this workshop, we’ll prepare the user flows, low fidelity mockups, technical architecture and cost estimation.

items.title: Implementation
items.description:
We will start the implementation process with all the items (user stories) in the backlog. Our lean process allows you to update the backlog or reprioritize the user stories. A communication channel is established with the client, typically using Slack.


We report the progress every week and release the software continuously to test environment and gather feedback.

items.title: Maintenance
items.description:
Our software development process that is focused on writing quality code, cover testing scenarios and rigorous code reviews results in less maintenance needed after release.

Nevertheless, we offer a maintenance package that includes bug fixes, small changes and updates (security, libraries). Projects without active development usually require 2 - 3 days booked for maintenance.

content.data: Let’s admit, hiring is hard. With us you can save time and get the resources you need, exactly when you need them. You can hire an extended team within days, not months. No recruiting. No training.
Extended teams are partnerships that usually last between 6 to 24 months. During this time, the team gains extensive knowledge about the product & processes which results in a better productivity.
Our resources are fully incorporated into your team and you have full control over the processes. You don’t need to change anything, we will adapt to your working environment.

Need to scale up? Need to fill a skill gap? Deadline around the corner? We got you covered as well! Our team of developers, designers and architects can join your team, support and then leave without any strings attached.

You will not only have access to the developers you are working directly with but to Softup’s whole brain power. If your developer needs support implementing a complex solution, he/she can ask support from other colleagues. That way  your project will never get stuck.
Established startups and SME with existing core teams that want to ramp up development speed quickly.

What if you could find the product-market fit in 10 days? Finding a product-market fit is always a long and complicated process. The earlier you can find it, the less money you will burn. We develop quick, light-weight prototypes (MVPs) of your ideal solution in 10 days so you can go out there and validate your product with real customer feedback.
We will build you a quick and low-cost prototype, so that you can learn and gather feedback from real customers before jumping into full coding mode.
No budget overrun. Don’t waste time and money building the wrong product.The service has a flat fee of **€3,500**. The fee covers meetings, workshops and implementation.
Early stage entrepreneurs / startups that want to build something from scratch. You have a vision and an idea, we help you bring that into reality.

accordionContent.description: We are equipped with the right set of technologies and tools to help you succeed! We carefully pick the best tech stacks that serve your needs and supports you on your journey.

data.name: READ MORE ABOUT TECHNOLOGIES WE USE

content.data:
- Typescript _(or JS when 'forced')_
 - React
 - Apollo Client (<3 GraphQL)
 - Less Redux, more Context API + Hooks
 - Webpack
 - SASS, CSS, LESS...

- React Native with Typescript
 - Swift or Kotlin
 - Fastlane
 - Testflight
 - Expo

- Node.JS with Typescript
 - GraphQL
 - Apollo Server
 - Swagger for documentation
 - Ruby on Rails
 - C# & .NET Core
 - PHP

- SQL (PostgreSQL, MySQL, MSSQL)
 - NoSQL (MongoDB, DynamoDB)
 - Caching (Redis)
 - Elasticsearch
- Depends on programming language / framework - but we write tests! That's how we ensure maintanability and longevity of our products.

- Monolith (small projects)
 - Microservices
 - Function as a Service AKA Serverless :)

- Grafana
 - Prometheus
 - Datadog
 - Sentry
 - Cloudwatch
 - List goes on...

- AWS, AWS, AWS (container based or serverless)
 - Digitalocean, Heroku
 - Local machine. What? No!

- Docker with Docker-Compose on AWS EC2
 - Docker on AWS ECS

- Bitbucket
 - Slack
 - JIRA / Trello
 - You name it...

- Bitbucket Pipelines
 - Github Actions
 - CircleCI

accordionContent.description: Our journey has led us to become experts not only in specific technologies, but also in specific industries. Explore the industries and learn more about technologies we love using to build top notch products.

content.data:
- Manage: buildings, units and facilities
 - Manage contracts for each tenant (fees, ratings)
 - Monitor contract changes in real time
 - Start / end dates for rent contracts
 - Oversee revenues and expenses for each unit and building
 - Compare financial performance between units and buildings in your portfolio
 - Track the status and condition of your buildings and units
 - Create Profit & Loss statements from your portfolio
 - Track utilization of units
 - Make data-driven investment decisions
 - Calculate tax and additional living costs (Nebenkosten)

- Draw conclusions based on data with just a few clicks
 - Aggregate massive amount of data into a single place
 - Use filters to draw meaningful insights
 - Access a large amount of data quickly and conventiently

- API First platform, build apps on top of the platform
 - Integrate with single modules
 - Detailed API Documentation, test & integrate quickly
 - Easy integration to the platform

- Translate business requirements into features in real estate
 - Expertise in real estate standards world-wide
 - We can understand the business logic behind the real estate use case and move along faster
 - Bring the vision into reality with a Dynamic API as a scalable product
 - We know the data model and business model of the real estate industry
 - We have over X amounts of units and buildings integrated to the platform
 - As we have expertise in the area, we can move faster. No learning curve needed
 - We understand how real estate companies manage and treat data.
 Deal with complex real estate business cases.

- Time Tracking
 - Absence Management
 - Employee Digital File
 - Analytics
 - Employee Performance
 - Revenue Perdictor (for agencies)
 - Invoice and Payroll Management
 - Employee Self-Service
 - Integration: Slack, Toggle, JIRA

accordionContent.description: We have built feature-rich platforms, high quality products and application software for clients all over the world. Our team has delivered high end solutions serving a wide range of industries such as IoT, Real Estate, E-Learning, Blockchain and many others. Click below to find more information about a some of our projects, along with the feedback from our clients.

content.data: The REALCUBE team is composed of true veterans in the Real Estate software space. Both cofounders have previously started and exited successful startups in the past. REALCUBE is a refined attempt at starting something from their hearts.

REALCUBE is the open Real Estate platform. Their API-based cloud technologies help Real Estate companies to manage their multiple properties, connect their desired apps, and run their daily operations in entirely new ways.

Finding a reliable external agency to develop a fully scalable solution is a daunting task. Companies struggle to find a partner that will provide high levels of quality products combined with a good communication and critical thinking skills.

The REALCUBE team had very strong industry experience and some technical advisors on board, but lacked the manpower to bring their solution to life. It was very important for the REALCUBE team not only to find a partner that would deliver, but one that would be an integral part of their core team going forward.

In 2017, REALCUBE ran a trial period with Softup. The goal was to develop one of its front- end modules. This way REALCUBE could verify that the developers at Softup were up to the task both technically and operationally.
Fast-forward three years later, REALCUBE has integrated Softup consultants: Business Analysis, Front-end & Back-end developers and Testers into their core team.
The collaboration has been hugely successful and as a result, REALCUBE has referred many new clients to Softup.

data.content: In 2017, REALCUBE GmbH started a viable partnership with Softup Technologies for high quality and efficient Frontend development projects. We especially appreciate the professional work stream from our functional specifications given, development of UI design guidelines to the completion and testing of our apps. Highly recommended partners!
data.author: Uwe Forgber

content.data: Cleu is the social and emotional learning complement for today’s classroom tools. Used by K-12 students as their daily alarm clock, students start the day more focused and alert. Using Cleu leads to higher grit, perseverance, and class attendance.

data.title: Fix most of the pressing issues and bugs

content.data:
Cleu founder, Uzair had fallen into the common trap of outsourcing the app development of his idea to a low-cost agency, in order to “fit” it into his limited budget.

The result was a mobile app that was a slow, unresponsive and bug prone app. He contacted Softup with the hope to fix most of the pressing issues and bugs.

One of our senior consultants quickly got to work and delivered within 48 hours a list of issues some known but most of them unknown, that needed to be handled right away for the app to be presentable in front of potential customers and investors.
All the issues were fixed in the next two weeks and shortly after Cleu was able to get a new batch of Beta users to the platform.

The founder would decide to work exclusively with Softup going forward in order to maintain the high performance and reliability of the mobile app. He scaled his development team at Softup with 3 developers working full time in order to make Cleu the most promising product in its niche.

Wirecard is one of the world's fastest-growing digital platforms in the area of financial commerce processing over €130 billion per year. They offer both businesses and consumers a constantly growing ecosystem of value-added services for innovative digital payments: online, mobile, and at the point of sale.

Wirecard`s marketing team had a very tight deadline to meet. They needed to request TrustPilot reviews from their thousands of merchants worldwide. To achieve that, they needed a modern Landing Page integrated with complex analytics in order to track merchants behaviour. The campaign was due to start within 5 business days.

Softup`s Business Analysis team jumped right into the project gathering all the necessary requirements. Within the first hour of contact they quickly were able to allocate resources in-house in order to help Wirecard to meet this critical timeline.

They delivered a first draft of the Landing Page within 24 hours, to allow time for Wirecard design and branding team to review and approve the images, logos and language use. The full product was ready within 3 business days, leaving the marketing team at Wirecard a good buffer to prepare for the rest of the campaign. Wirecard was very satisfied with the delivery and found a trustworthy partner in the ordeal.

Leva is a Zurich-based Legal & FinTech company that enables you to raise capital efficiently and manage investment deals over the entire lifecycle in one place. The team is composed of young entrepreneurs who are shaping this industry.

Leva is a blockchain based investment platform for private markets. They leverage the technology of distributed ledgers to make off-chain assets accessible to everybody. As a two-sided platform, Leva is a central hub for the funding of, investing in, and trading of formerly illiquid private assets.

Through Leva, asset managers efficiently fund equity investments into specific private assets, or even open complete fund vehicles. And thanks to Leva, individuals can access the lucrative world of private markets, invest alongside professional asset managers and participate in the value creation of private companies.

As a young start up, Leva had limited funds to achieve of their business goals. This made it extremely difficult to find qualified engineers in Zurich. After six months of searching in Switzerland and the DACH region they were still not able to fill their open positions.
This is when they looked to find remote developers elsewhere in the world.
Softup was able to find an urgently needed Full Stack JavaScript developer withing days. Within 6 months the team working for Leva grew from one to four developers working full-time on the project.

This helped Leva get the critical traction and prove to their investors that they can deliver. After 9 months of collaboration Leva was able to secure their next round of funding and take their product development to the next level.
ZenGrowth is a Munich based growth agency that helps tech companies reach a new level of growth. ZenGrowth takes advantage of expert growth hackers in order to produce hyper growth for its clients.

In order to implement various growth strategies like Content Marketing, ZenGrowth has had to build Blogs, Optimized Landing Pages and CMS systems for their clients. This came with its own challenges as ZenGrowth is specialized in online marketing and not software development. Hiring and sourcing for skilled development isn’t always easy when that is not your core focus.
By enabling a partnership with Softup, ZenGrowth now has access to a pool of expert developers specializing in:

- Landing Page design and implementation
 - Content Management Systems implementation
 - Website performance and Analytics tests
 - WordPress themes and plugins
 - Website back-end architecture
 - Database & Server integration
By partnering with Softup on the technology front, ZenGrowth can now go back and focus on serving their clients with what they really excel at; marketing and growth strategy.

accordionContent.description: Ready for a Challenge? We are glad that you are interested to learn more about opportunities that we have at Softup Technologies. We are growing pretty fast, and we need your help. You can start by learning more about who we are.
We love engineering and we want to share that passion with others too. That’s why we post frequently on our blog about technologies, architecture, side projects, challenges and solutions.
